paragraphs.text: Wow, Ellen. You guys covered all the bases! Amazing. Diet, Detox, Dental. That is the next step on our journey, removing the old metal toxins from the teeth. It is a tricky procedure not to re-infect the body so we are now looking for the right person in Los Angeles/Orange County. We have a couple prospects we are following up on. Thanks.

Good question. I think there’s a big difference between processed sugar and what is found in fruits. My wife pretty much sticks to berries as they have the lowest glycemic content. She eats a little apple and avoids oranges. And then bread converts into sugar so that is taken in minimally as well. Processed sugar though is the thing we really avoid.
